TopicTitle: ksp2 wont let me start a campaign.

Articles.Content:
Ksp2 will not let me start a campaign. its just the dull clicking sound and nothing else. i have tried verifying the files on steam and updating everything and still nothing. if anyone has a solution please contact me. thank you.

Edited March 9, 2023 by Vanamonde

could you elaborate? there are 38 pages of bugs here - all nooted in the game - what exactly happens? maybe you should follow the guidelines post and tell them your system configuration as well? I mean mine starts new games normally every time... did you give your space company a name, selected the flag etc.?
yes. i have done everything. given it a name, selected the flag, ect.
do you have any solutions. i was effectively locked out of ksp2.

Check out this thread, and see if it matches the problem you're having.

If it matches your problem: If you are lucky, you may be able to get the game to work with some of the proposed solutions in that thread. If none of them work, I'm afraid you'll be stuck until the studio releases an update.
